lines.text: Something tells me there's more in this jungle than meets the eye.
[Tisa watches as Daria struggles against her chains]
I know it can't be done.

[amazed]
I'm just glad that you didn't know it.

[Upon entering a spacecraft]
Where's the ignition on this one?
Well, that shouldn't be a problem for you.
Not a particularly original response, but I'm sure it is a sincere expression of your fears.
If life wasn't so cruel, everything would be beautiful.
What have we got to lose? Don't answer that!
I have a strangest feeling that the normal laws of time and space no longer apply.
